text: (minisā kumana tatvayaka siṭiyadī vuvada) ohuṭa idiriyenda, pasupasinda nokaḍavā pæmi‚ya hæki (malāyikāvarun) kihipa deneku siṭinnāha. ovun allāhgē niyōgayan magin ohuva ārakṣā karannāha. minisun (tamangē napuru gati guṇayangen) tamanva venas nokara gannā turu, niyata vaśayenma allāhda (ovunṭa pahaḷa kaḷa varaprasādayan) venas kara harinnē næta. allāh kumana samuhayanṭa hō hāniyak kirīmaṭa adahas kaḷahot eya vaḷakvannan kisivekut næta. ovunṭa udav karannanda ohu misa, vena kisivekut næta
